data.message: Heaven has blue carpet. By Sharon Niedzinski. It's a wonderful book based on a true story. One of my very favorites :-)

replies.message: Sounds interesting, Melissa. Thanks for sharing! -Rhea
i reported someone with a fake profile and fb said it was ok. it wasn't now somebody else says they work for mark zuckerberg and i won something.

Facebook Dear Facebook team !!
I have contacted facebook many times about my ads manager account as it isn't disabled nor deactivated but still i am unable to create ads . I have contacted support team many times and submitted many documents for the re-enabling of my ad account but neither team nor any other person replyed to my support request , neither through support page nor through email . My question is simple if you are not able to reply to my support request why do you always shows that you will contact with me through email or support request. I need your team's personal assistant in this matter as i am really desperate now coz it's been 4 months and i am still unable to get any satisfied reply on your behalf . Please get back to me ASAP .
Thanks !!!
